did.unittitle: Luella H. Brock New York viewbook
did.abstract: The Luella H. Brock New York viewbook contains black-and-white illustrations showing views of New York City, circa 1900. The views are primarily of locations in Manhattan, though there are two images relating to Brooklyn; a view the Brooklyn Bridge and a view from the Brooklyn tower of the Brooklyn Bridge.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: Viewbooks, also called souvenir albums or view albums, are books that contain commercially published groups of photographs depicting a place, activity, or event.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Luella H. Brock New York viewbook contains black-and-white illustrations showing views of New York City, circa 1900. The views are primarily of locations in Manhattan, though there are two images relating to Brooklyn; a view the Brooklyn Bridge and a view from the Brooklyn tower of the Brooklyn Bridge.
